name: A Seagull's Revenge
description:
Due to the trauma you experienced as a young bird, you have vowed to kill all humans using your poop. 

Move your seagull with your arrow keys and press space to poop on the humans. Each human that is killed earns you a point.

 But watch out! The humans will try to throw black rocks at you to decrease your health. You can recover you health by collecting the chip bags that are falling from the sky.

Keep on playing until you die and try to beat your high score!
